content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a furnace entity at position (41.0, -82.0) with a burner mining drill at position (43.0, -82.0) and a chest at position (42.5, -83.5).

### Burner Mining Drill at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill entity at position (43.0, -82.0) with a furnace at position (41.0, -82.0), a chest at position (42.5, -83.5), and a burner inserter at position (43.5, -80.5).

### Chests at positions (42.5, -83.5), (44.5, -81.5), (45.5, -80.5), and (43.5, -79.5)
Consists of four chest entities at the respective positions, connected to the burner mining drill and the burner inserter.

### Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)
Consists of a burner inserter entity at position (43.5, -80.5) connected to the burner mining drill, and the chests at positions (42.5, -83.5), (44.5, -81.5), and (43.5, -79.5).

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to insert items into entities
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before trying to insert them into entities.
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to insert items into is valid and exists.

### Errors when trying to extract items from entities
- Make sure the entity you are trying to extract items from contains the items you are trying to extract.
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to extract items from is valid and exists.

### Errors when trying to place entities
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before trying to place entities.
- Ensure that the position where you are trying to place the entity is valid and not occupied by another entity.
- Move closer to the position where you are trying to place the entity if you are too far away.

### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has fuel before trying to use it.
- Empty the chest at the drop position if it is full to continue mining.
